task.title: Building output using Ant
task.shortdesc: You can build output by running the ant command and specifying the DITA-OT parameters at the command prompt. You also can use an Ant build script to provide the DITA-OT parameters

step.cmd: To provide the DITA-OT parameters from the command prompt, issue the following command:
If you use a build script, issue the following command:
step.info:
ant -f build-script targetwhere:
build-script is name of the Ant build script.
target is an optional switch that specifies the name of the Ant target that you want to run. If you do not specify a target, the value of the @default attribute for the Ant project is used.
